I'm dumping a bunch of useful stuff about p-values I found while writing Week 02 now.

## Twitter poll: same p-values different sizes

"If you have two studies with the *exact* same p-value, one with a small sample size and one with a large sample size, which would you find more convincing?"

- https://twitter.com/LucyStats/status/1029534591760195584?s=20&t=KE6HPh3zRy42IGvfu7Jp5g

And a GREAT follow-up article from the author https://livefreeordichotomize.com/2018/08/21/p-value-thoughts-a-twitter-follow-up/
